Trabajo en Mercado Libre como Principal Engineer (Individual Contributor), donde formo parte del equipo que construye la plataforma de frontend que se utiliza en toda la compa√±√≠a para crear aplicaciones web (React / Node.js) y aplicaciones nativas (Jetpack Compose / SwiftUI). Actualmente estoy 100% enfocado en desarrollo nativo de IA, usando Specs, MCPs, Skills y "est√°ndares" emergentes para conectar LLMs con nuestra herramientas y librer√≠as internas.
Hello! I'm a frontend developer with a creative vision and a great passion for technology.
I love and keep close track of frontend trends, web standards, web performance, and digital accessibility.
Really excited about AI and Agents. A journey that required unlearning and learning again.

I work as Principal Engineer at Mercado Libre (Individual Contributor), where I'm part of the team building the frontend platform used company-wide to create web applications (React / Node.js) and native applications (Jetpack Compose / SwiftUI). Currently 100% focused on AI-native development, I leverage Specs, MCPs, Skills and emerging standards to bridge LLMs with our internal tools and libraries.
